alert.note: Alert for South Lincoln County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 21 at 10:51PM MST until December 22 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THURSDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills between 20 and 30 below zero. * WHERE...South Lincoln County. * WHEN...Until 11 AM Thursday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The most susceptible parts of the body to frostbite are the extremities such as fingers, toes and the tip of the nose. If you must go outside, try to stay out of the wind, and dress in several layers of loose fitting, lightweight, warm clothing.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
